imdb.plot outline: La Chispa de Chef Carmen is an exciting quest through Costa Rica, Guatemala, Panama and the Dominican Republic. As we navigate through the natural beauty of each country, we hold castings to find a chef's assistant for the renown and charismatic chef, Carmen González. While Chef Carmen encounters new challenges in her life, (opening a restaurant in Maine, launching a book and producing her celebrity talk+cooking show in Miami) she invites viewers to take a look into her life as an awarded chef.
imdb.title: La Chispa de Chef Carmen Gonzalez
akas: La Chispa de Chef Carmen Gonzalez (United States)
plot: Reality TV, interviews and cooking from _La Chispa de Chef Carmen Gonzalez_ (qv).::Coltro, Marcello

La Chispa de Chef Carmen is an exciting quest through Costa Rica, Guatemala, Panama and the Dominican Republic. As we navigate through the natural beauty of each country, we hold castings to find a chef's assistant for the renown and charismatic chef, Carmen González. While Chef Carmen encounters new challenges in her life, (opening a restaurant in Maine, launching a book and producing her celebrity talk+cooking show in Miami) she invites viewers to take a look into her life as an awarded chef.
